short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping people who tend to procrastinate to focus - by blocking social media, news and other distractions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nowadays it's easy to get distracted by social media, news and other websites. In the end of the day you find yourself wondering where all that time went and work is still not done.

Work Focus helps people to focus on work by allowing the user to activate focus mode which will block all websites distracting you.

In the onboarding and options you can add domains that you want to block during focus time.
